description: For Leon Styles, Adrian Layton and Skyler, Wednesday afternoons are pretty typical. Skyler's parents are never home the three guys always chill over at his house. From there they can usually find some sort of activity to keep themselves entertained, even if it's just a simple game of Truth or Dare. It doesn't really matter anyway. Whatever they do they just end up naked and cumming on each other!Enjoy!
series: NDT - 8094 - Leon Styles, Adrian Layton & Skyler
title: Playing Games
